trans-unit.source: Provides data for the `RowUpdated` event of a .NET Framework data provider.
The `RowUpdated` event message is typically raised when an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> to a row is completed.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> sent through an <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> executed when <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)"></xref> is called.
The type of SQL statement executed.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> sent through an <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)"></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> executed when <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)"></xref> is called.
The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> executed when <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)"></xref> is called.
Copies references to the modified rows into the provided array.
`array` must be at least <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.RowCount%2A> in length.
Throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> for a null instance of <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
The array of <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to copy into.
Copies references to the modified rows into the provided array.
`array` must be at least <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.RowCount%2A> + `arrayIndex` in length.
Throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> for a null instance of <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
The array of <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to copy into.
The index in the array to start copying into.
Gets any errors generated by the .NET Framework data provider when the <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command"></xref> was executed.
The errors generated by the .NET Framework data provider when the <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command"></xref> was executed.
Gets the number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted by execution of the SQL statement.
The number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted; 0 if no rows were affected or the statement failed; and -1 for SELECT statements.
Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> sent through an <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)"></xref>.
When batching is enabled, the value of this property will be null.
Updated rows can be accessed through one of the `RowUpdatedEventArgs.CopyToRows` methods.
The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> sent through an <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)"></xref>.
Gets the number of rows processed in a batch of updated records.
`int` that specifies the number of row processed.
Gets the type of SQL statement executed.
<xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.StatementType%2A> can be one of the following values:
Select
Insert
Update
Delete
The type of SQL statement executed.
Gets the <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command"></xref> property.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"></xref> values.
The default is `Continue`.
Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> sent through an <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> sent through an <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)"></xref>.
